ThingDef.label: Black Widow Brood Mind
ThingDef.description: The mycelial tangles of a Black Widow's brood mind. Removed from her body, they still faintly pulse with psionic power.

ThingDef.label: Black Widow Core Mind
ThingDef.description: A Black Widow core mind. Good in a pinch, probably...

ThingDef.label: black widow bionic pedipalps
ThingDef.description: Bionic Black Widow pedipalps. Sharp and deadly, they significantly increase a widow's close combat prowess, at the expense of manipulation capacity. Their piercing strikes can be of such strength and ferocity that, when landed just right, they can knock down even the fiercest foes.

ThingDef.label: black widow prosthetic spider leg
ThingDef.description: A simple leg prosthesis designed for a Black Widow's unique physiognomy.

ThingDef.label: black widow shredder spider leg
ThingDef.description: Advanced biotic replacements for black widow legs. Though slightly slower than the biological legs that widows are born with, they are crafted with plasteel blades inset along their edges, adding substantially to a Widow's close combat potential for each leg improved, and inflicting a steadily worsening, consciousness draining bleed with every strike.

ThingDef.label: black widow sleipnir-reticulated bionic arm
ThingDef.description: Sleipnir reticulated bionic arm, dividing at the elbows into two separate fully functional lower arms and hands. They allow unprecedented manipulation ability.

ThingDef.label: black widow bionic heart mind
ThingDef.description: The core mind of a black widow (what most normal sentients would consider their brains) is atrophied and weak due to co-evolution with the brood mind hosted in a widow's body. The heart mind amplifies and corrects this evolutionary deficit, bringing a widow's core mind to a level equal with that of a human. The impact on their overall cognitive ability is... drastic.

ThingDef.label: black widow integrated brood mind
ThingDef.description: The independent sentiences known as brood minds do not much care for being tampered with, but are happy to allow a widow to implant and alter her body to better house and protect them. Bionic womb mind shielding replaces a widow's biological uterus with an archotech quality mechanoid housing. This housing does little to change the operation of her brood mind, but it does amplify her ability to harness its energies without disturbing it, allowing widows to shrug off small quantities of damage with subdermally infused psionic shielding.
